description: Sans is a lazy skeleton who enjoys ketchup and puns. He possesses a single health point but can dodge attacks, dealing one damage per millisecond and inflicting kr/poison damage. His attacks include Gaster Blasters, bones, and platforms, with a special attack being a Gaster Blaster spiral and the ability to manipulate gravity. He cares for his brother, Papyrus, and has a hotdog stand and a large tab at Grillby's, where he is popular.  He is associated with several Undertale characters.
